name: War Shooting Enemies Experien
description:
War Shooting Enemies Experience is full of action and modern weapons. Your beloved country is full of gangsters. You received the call for shoot so take your modern shooting and clean your country from criminal militants. Use your best survival skills and fight with most wanted criminals. This latest shooting game is full of unique and immersive adventure. Target the brutal enemies like a legendary army shooter and prove that you are the best Army Sniper Spy Commando in the world. gives you an experience of war against the highly trained militants who are hidden in their secret base camp in the hill stone. Destroy all the militants camps by using your survival skills and strike against the gangsters.
Features:
- Variety of guns and high tech weapons.
- Tons of 3D shooting missions are available.
- Realistic shooting environment with HD vivid graphics.
- Real sound effects of gun shooting gameplay.
- Addictive first person shooting experience.
- Detailed structure of army sniper guns.
- Smooth and realistic controls of high tech weapons.
